name: Cowboy Hell
description:
After The Cowboy is killed in a duel, he wakes up in a western-themed underworld.

Cowboy Hell is a top-down shooter and adventure game. Explore a densely packed world full of challenges and collectibles. Talk to friends, fight monsters, solve puzzles, and defeat multiple varied bosses. Build your munitions and skills as you work up towards defeating the final boss and main overlord of hell, Jeff Bezos!

Key Features

  • Explore the world how you want! Some sections are more linear, but most of the world can be explored in your own order!
  • Difficult action! Some fights, puzzles, minigames, and sections aren't as casual as they first appear!
  • Collect coins and buy more gear in the Hell Shop™ (including fancy boots and soylent), and find new and unique items around the map!
  • Solve puzzles with the unique lasso! Use it to pull levers and blocks from a distance, maybe enemies too.
  • Fight Jeff Bezos (very hard). He has like, 4 stages
  • We don't take ourselves too seriously. Prepare for silliness and just like, have fun! alright nicee
  • P.S. send your horse to heaven <3
